{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=V1000H |revision=(Telus) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2010 |fcc_date=05/07/2009 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=LNQ802MBN |ic_id=2496A-802MBN,2496A-Q1000H |us_id= |pwr_v=10 |pwr_amp=1.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6368 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+,VDSL,HomePNA (coax) |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TELUSXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TELUS[0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=telus |oui=A8:39:44 |oui_eth=A8:39:44 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless N VDSL Modem Router''
[http://www.actiontec.com/products/product.php?pid=191 Product page]
[http://www.actiontec.com/products/datasheets/ActiontecV1000Hncsdatasheet.pdf Datasheet]
[http://www.actiontec.com/products/manuals/V1000H%20User%20Manual%20NCS.pdf User manual] [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=92181 On the DD-WRT forums] This device appears to use BCM6368. The user manual shows the sample SSID as following the format of '''ActiontecV1000H(XXXX)'''. There are 2 matches in WiGLE for this SSID format. US: LNQDL02BQ1000H ==Images== File:V1000Hprdct frnt.jpg|main [[Has images::external| ]]
